entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add an IsVisible Property to <Span> Elements #23470

Closed

  • BackButtonBehavior IsVisible="False" does not hide the back button on iOS #23424
  • [iOS]BackButtonBehavior IsEnabled="False" does not Disable the back button on iOS #5195
    Backlog
  • [iOS, Preview 4 and 5] iOS build fails with MessagingRemoteException in UnpackLibraryResources when connected to Mac #23440
  • [iOS] Tap gesture recognizer fires tap event for a label when the label is disabled #23453

PullRequests

Created

  • [net9] BackButtonBehavior enhancement - Changed IsVisible & IsEnabled BindingMode to OneWay #23467
    t/enhancement ☀️, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Add analyzer for TestCase and missing Category #23465
    area-testing

Merged

  • Move PopLifeCycle to device tests #23468
  • Bump to 8.0.80 #23469
  • Shell BackButtonBehavior improvement #23466
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Added missing ui test categories #23464
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing

Updated

  • Null guard in `ShellFlyoutTemplatedContentRenderer.HeaderContainer.UpdateMinimumHeight` #16573
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Fix BoxView not rendering when is hidden on start #21960
    area-layout, area-drawing, community ✨, .NET 8 SR8
  • Use DialogFragment for Android modals #22869
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-dialogalert
  • [Windows] Respect `ClearButtonVisibility = ClearButtonVisibility.Never` for `<Entry>`s #23158
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
